name: KIN leather wrap bracelet
description:
Our double wrap bracelet is made from the same high quality veg tanned leather as the straps on all our bags, just thinner and narrower.  Handmade with solid brass connections and stamped with the message 'KIN', it represents a reminder of an investment made in family.

All of the profit from the purchase of this bracelet is given to fund adoptions.  Both ours and others'.

*Veg tanned leather darkens with age, developing a beautiful patina.  One size fits "most" and can be stretched to fit others.

**Due to high initial response, please allow approximately one week for your bracelet to ship.  We are ever so grateful. 

**To learn more about our KIN Campaign, click the link at the top of the page.

name: the leather carryall clutch, sienna
description:
Simple & sophisticated, it's an oversized clutch that's perfect for carrying just about all your essentials. Gorgeous sienna brown leather & antiqued snaps.

Measurements are 15 3/4" wide & 9 1/4" tall.

name: the all leather tote, black
description:
Made entirely of rich black leather. Unlined with a generously sized hanging pocket on the inside. Other details include hand hammered copper rivets,natural leather shoulder straps, contrast neon stitching, & leather fringe detailing. Simple & sophisticated, it may be the last tote you'll ever need.

Measurements are 16" wide, 17" tall, & a 7 1/2" shoulder strap drop.

name: the baja, fushia & sage
description:
Heavyweight woven cotton body & rich tan leather bottom. Inside is fully lined. Other details include two interior pockets, contrast stitching, hand hammered copper rivets, & natural leather straps. It's an essential.

Measurements are 17" wide, 13 3/4" tall, & 24" shoulder straps.

description:

description:

description:

description:

Measurements are 16" wide, 17" tall, & a 7 1/2" shoulder strap drop.

name: the drawstring bag, lodge
description:
The drawstring bag in a gorgeous green patterned wool. Bottom is a rich tan leather. Inside is fully lined with light gray canvas. Other details include natural leather strap, hand hammered copper rivets, & natural leather cording & wooden bead closure. It's compact but roomy, & the long strap is comfy over one shoulder or carrying cross body.

Measurements are 25" around, 10" tall, & a 50" carrying strap.

name: leather envelope clutch, walnut
description:

Measurements are 10 1/2" wide & 6"tall.

name: the leather sojourn tote, tan
description:

Sophisticated & rugged all at once.

Measurements are 18 1/4" wide, 13 1/4" tall, 41/4" deep, & 24 1/2" carrying straps.

name: the baja bucket bag, natural & red
description:
Introducing the new bucket bag.  Heavyweight woven fabric is paired with a round caramel leather bottom.  Inside is fully lined with natural canvas, & other details include an antique snap closure, hand hammered copper rivets, & natural leather shoulder straps. Simple & generously sized for carrying all of your Summer essentials. 

Measurements are 15" wide, 14" tall, & an 8" shoulder strap drop.

name: the weekender
description:
Perfectly rugged & refined & crafted of salvaged striped wool & waxed tan leather. It's everything you need to pack your belongings for an adventurous few days. Other details include interior lining with large pocket, contrast stitching, heavy duty separating zipper, hand hammered copper rivets, & wide natural leather straps. 

Measurements are 22" wide, 15" tall, 7 1/4" deep. 

Straps are 22 1/2" long. 

*Due to the nature of using salvaged materials, each bag may differ ever so slightly.

name: the weekender, hers
description:
Perfectly rugged & refined, this generously sized carryall will help set you on a little adventure. Heavyweight woven fabric is paired with a waxed tan leather bottom.  Other details include interior lining with large pocket, heavy duty separating zipper, contrast neon stitching, hand hammered copper rivets, & natural leather carrying straps that darken beautifully over time. 

Measurements are 22" wide, 15 1/2" tall, & 6 3/4" deep.

Carrying straps are 24 1/4".

name: sahara tote
description:
Subtle but beautiful patterns are woven into gorgeous heavyweight fabric that paired with a beautiful lightly distressed tan leather bottom. Other details include light gray canvas lining, contrasting interior pockets, hand hammered copper rivets, contrast neon stitching, & natural leather tote straps.

Measurements are 16" wide, 17" tall, & a 7 1/2" shoulder strap drop.

name: the leather drawstring bag, coffee
description:
The drawstring bag in a gorgeous dark brown leather. Inside is fully lined with light gray canvas. Other details include natural leather strap, hand hammered copper rivets, natural leather cording, & wooden bead detailing. It's compact but roomy, & the long strap is comfy over one shoulder or carrying cross body.

Measurements are 25" around, 10" tall, & a 50" carrying strap.

name: leather key lanyard
description:
One half of Remnant's favorite everyday carry. Our key chain lanyard is made of the same high quality leather strapping that we use on all of our handbags. With solid brass hardware & a hand hammered copper rivet, it's sure to last a lifetime. 

Overall length measures 6". 

Choose from veg tanned (light) or latigo (dark). Please specify upon checkout. 

**Veg tanned leather will darken & develop a beautiful patina over time.

name: skinny cowhide cuff
description: Pair your narrow cowhide cuff with all your other favorite wrist wear or wear solo. Approximately 1/4" wide & 7 3/4" around. Details include an antique brass ring & stitching.

name: bracelet stand
description:
We've always loved the idea of beauty being found in the storage & display of your everyday things. This bracelet stand is made entirely of re-purposed wood & railroad spikes. 

Measurements are 15" around & 7 1/2" tall.
